event.title: was known as Xiangfan (Chinese: 襄樊) until December 2, 2010

data.event: It was known as Xiangfan (Chinese: 襄樊) until December 2, 2010.

event.title: Today, the city is, after the capital Wuhan, the second largest in the province, located

data.event: Today, the city is, after the capital Wuhan, the second largest in the province, located about halfway between Wuhan and Xi'an.
